grading_explanation.practical_foundation: 2.9/3 – 24 of 35 fields filled (68% completion). Higher completion indicates better self-awareness and thoroughness.
grading_explanation.technical_competency: 1.0/2 – Good employability: Solid technical skills with minor gaps that can be quickly filled
grading_explanation.hands_on_experience: 2.5/3 – Strong candidate: 1 solid internship (COTHON Solutions) + projects (ConvAi, Project 11, Face and QR attendance)
grading_explanation.growth_potential: 1.0/2 – Moderate potential: Basic extra-curricular involvement OR some career awareness

hiring_insights.strongest_assets: Solid practical experience with an internship and multiple projects, strong technical skills
hiring_insights.development_areas: Need to provide clearer detail on roles, responsibilities, and achievements in project work, demonstrate more leadership experience and initiative
hiring_insights.industry_readiness: Requires significant skill development and professional growth to be fully industry-ready

grading_debug.notes: This candidate has a solid foundation in practical experience and technical skills but lacks sufficient leadership experience and self-awareness to be considered highly employable.
